name: What is it? The Game!
description:
Brand new from the studio that brought you Coin Dozer comes, What is it, The Game! We'll show you a hidden image and you guess what it is! You can tap to see more of the picture, but watch out! You want to solve the puzzle by removing as few pieces as possible! If the image isn’t enough, we’ll give you hints to help you along.

Never fear if you get through all of our puzzles: you can make some of your own! Snap a photo with your phone, and we’ll make it into a puzzle for you! Send your creations to your friends and family, and see if they can solve your riddles! Find out which of your friends is the puzzle master with What is it!

Conquer our puzzles or create your own—either way, What is it, The Game! will keep you entertained for hours! Check it out today, and be on the lookout for further puzzle-y updates!
